description: Try our easy to follow Pavlova With Summer Fruit & Passionfruit Syrup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pavlova With Summer Fruit & Passionfruit Syrup
name: Pavlova With Summer Fruit & Passionfruit Syrup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place pavlova onto a cake stand. Pour cream into a large bowl and whip with an electric beater until soft peaks form. Spoon cream onto pavlova. Top with mango slices, raspberries, blueberries and passionfruit syrup. Garnish with mint leaves, and serve.
